title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Enhancing Organizational Engagement via HRM Strategies and Informal Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational behavior theory and familiarity with HRM terminology
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: They can develop a conceptual framework connecting eight HRM practices with informal learning facilitation elements.
They can explain the mediating effect of emotional engagement based on organizational support theory and situational learning theory.
They can analyze corporate cases to design an interaction model among HRM strategies, emotional engagement, and informal learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
